indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description:
1. Number and percentage of new smear-positive TB patients successfully treated (cured plus completed treatment) among the new smear positive TB patients registered
2. Number of new smear-positive TB cases detected
3. Number of health facilities with at least one health worker trained on TB
4. Percentage of all forms of TB patients successfully treated (cured plus completed treatment) among the new all TB forms patients registered
5. Number of new TB cases detected (all forms)
6. Number of TB suspects amongst refugees who are screened for TB according to national policy
7. Number of contacts of smear-positive TB patients screened for TB according to national policy
8. Number and percentage of MoH and UNWRA health facilities receiving quarterly supervision visits with documented feedback reports
9. Number and percentage of districts submitting timely and complete quarterly reports on notification and treatment outcome according to the national guidelines
10. Proportion of TB units reporting no stock-out of first-line anti-TB drugs for more than a week in the last reporting quarter
11. Number and percentage of laboratories showing adequate performance in external quality assurance for smear microscopy among the total number of laboratories that undertake smear microscopy during the reporting period

iati-activity.title: Right to Education in the Gaza Strip
